Title: The Man with Two Legs
Plot: Jeff finally gets to speak to Chrissy, the woman on the train whose leg he has been fancying for days, and tells her that he only has one leg, a lie which becomes ever harder to undo. Meanwhile, Sally is dating a "surgeon" called David, and Jeff wonders whether it would be easier.
GuestStars: Alison King, Paul Moody, Simon Chadwick, Imogen Bain
